Air Purification: A helmet with an integrated air filtration system that can filter out pollutants and allergens, improving air quality while cycling.
Navigation System: A helmet with a built-in GPS and turn-by-turn navigation, helping cyclists find their way and avoid getting lost.
Safety Alert System: A helmet with a Bluetooth connection to a smartphone that can alert emergency contacts in case of an accident.
Personalized Design: A customizable helmet with the ability to upload and print personalized designs, allowing cyclists to express their unique style.
Weather Protection: A helmet with a weather-resistant cover that can be extended to shield against rain, wind, or snow, keeping the cyclist dry and comfortable.
